p: A total of 60 participants were enrolled during April and May 2017 into SHARED‐2. Baseline characteristics of those participants enrolled in SHARED‐2 were similar to the 240 participants enrolled in SHARED‐1 (Table 1). Seventy‐two percent of SHARED‐2 participants were female, and the median age was 63 years. A total of 4 participants were co‐infected with HIV. Thirteen participants had cirrhosis, as indicated by an APRI score of less than 1.0.
